channel.title: EdgevillePkz Is back. [Posted by Rene]
channel.description:
Hello Guys, I'm bringing edgevillepkz back as many wanted. This is version 2,5 the most updated one. This is not the one Demise and me released ages ago. Don't say leech or something because i was Owner of the server where Demise coded, then he quit and i continued. The server had a 3 week downtime and i'm putting it back on now. It's 24/7.
Features. 1) Fixed Xlog 2) Improved range following 3) Full melee following 4) New crafting interface 5) All the latest 474 animations 6) Improved effects for all barrow sets 7) Modern Ancient Magic Hovering 8) PvP Point system 9) Kill row system, EG kill more then one person in a row and you get bonus points. 10) Ranks system, you gain a title on ::yell dependant on the amount of kills you have. Eg if you had 50 kills on and you yelled it would say ("Playername, Officer:") 11) PvP timer like runescape 12) Fixed PvP timer bug against NPC's 13) Full barrelchest anchor with balanced stats 14) PvP Drops system (1/200 Chance to gain an additional drop) 15) Inferno adz with attack effect 16) Dagon Hai with set effect 17) Improved graphical interfaces via client 18) New runescape Hitsplat effects 19) Christmas event [Removed now because christmas is over] 20) New runescape HP Bars 21) Equipment Interface, Client sided 22) Working target system! 23) Full highscore system based on points that discludes admins+ 24) Instant dds special 25) Perfect claw special with correct emote and timing
Bank buttons=] [img]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/MikEiZFourSh0t/bank-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/MikEiZFourSh0t/agsspecial-2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/MikEiZFourSh0t/bhs-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/MikEiZFourSh0t/zgsspecial-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/MikEiZFourSh0t/crossbowanim-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/MikEiZFourSh0t/DragonClaws-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/MikEiZFourSh0t/newbowanim-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/MikEiZFourSh0t/scoreboard-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/MikEiZFourSh0t/sgsspecial-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/MikEiZFourSh0t/vengeance-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/MikEiZFourSh0t/vengother-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/MikEiZFourSh0t/statspy-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/MikEiZFourSh0t/targets.jpg[/img]
You can download the client here. http://www.mediafire.com/?i4vzzmzmmzl

item.title: EdgevillePkz Is back. [Posted by Rene]
item.dc:creator: @Rene_eats_waffl3z Rene eats waffl3z
item.description:
@Rene_eats_waffl3z wrote:

Hello Guys, I’m bringing edgevillepkz back as many wanted.
This is version 2,5 the most updated one. This is not the one Demise and me released ages ago.
Don’t say leech or something because i was Owner of the server where Demise coded, then he quit and i continued.
The server had a 3 week downtime and i’m putting it back on now. It’s 24/7.

Features.

  1. Fixed Xlog
  2. Improved range following
  3. Full melee following
  4. New crafting interface
  5. All the latest 474 animations
  6. Improved effects for all barrow sets
  7. Modern Ancient Magic Hovering
  8. PvP Point system
  9. Kill row system, EG kill more then one person in a row and you get bonus points.
  10. Ranks system, you gain a title on ::yell dependant on the amount of kills you have. Eg if you had 50 kills on and you yelled it would say (“Playername, Officer:”)
  11. PvP timer like runescape
  12. Fixed PvP timer bug against NPC’s
  13. Full barrelchest anchor with balanced stats
  14. PvP Drops system (1/200 Chance to gain an additional drop)
  15. Inferno adz with attack effect
  16. Dagon Hai with set effect
  17. Improved graphical interfaces via client
  18. New runescape Hitsplat effects
  19. Christmas event [Removed now because christmas is over]
  20. New runescape HP Bars
  21. Equipment Interface, Client sided
  22. Working target system!
  23. Full highscore system based on points that discludes admins+
  24. Instant dds special
  25. Perfect claw special with correct emote and timing

Bank buttons=]












You can download the client here.
http://www.mediafire.com/?i4vzzmzmmzl
